createView.selectQuery:
SELECT a.id,
    a.facility_id,
    a.source_system_id,
    a.appointment_confirmation_number,
    a.load_id,
    a.inbound_outbound,
    a.dock_door_number,
    a.scheduled_start_datetime,
    a.scheduled_end_datetime,
    a.original_scheduled_datetime,
    a.requested_pull_time,
    a.source_row_id,
    a.updated_at,
    a.deleted_at,
    a.created_at,
    a.confirmation_datetime,
    a.confirmed_by,
    a.warehouse_customer_id,
    a.trailer_load_type,
    a.scheduled_datetime,
    a.scheduled_duration,
    a.comments,
    a.carrier_code,
    a.appointment_contact_name,
    a.appointment_contact_phone,
    a.appointment_contact_email,
    a.trailer_number
   FROM appointments_staging a;

SELECT drivers_raw.driver_id,
    drivers_raw.name,
    drivers_raw.phone_number
   FROM drivers_raw;
